TopicTitle: Rover on Rover Crime ... Touch ea other causing one too shoot up into the air

Articles.Content:
So .. I have not played in a long bit ..

 

Got everything installed and work ... have alot of mods over all so not sure if its A mod or just the game.

 

Anyhow .. when I have 2 rovers (just doing testing at the space center) ...and one bumps / touches ( Litf or drive on one of the rams the other one has ) ... one of them will go flying in the air  ... not talking a litte ... maybe 80+ feet .. 

 

game is not crashing .. everything seems too be running fine ... 

It seems too be any parts ... have made a few rovers from different mods or stock .. happens no matter what it seems. 

Anyone know if its A bug with 1.3.1 or if any mods are causing this ?
